The [93mresults[0m [93mshowed[0m that the [93moptimal[0m [93mcombination[0m of [93mparameters[0m that [93mresulted[0m in [93mshrinkage[0m, [93mporosity[0m and [93mminimal[0m [93mincomplete[0m [93mdefects[0m were at [93mgating[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m, [93mriser[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m1[0m, [93mmold[0m [93mcondition[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m and [93mpouring[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m3[0m. The [93mresults[0m of the [93mcomparison[0m before and after [93moptimization[0m were an [93mincrease[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m77[0m, where [93mpreviously[0m it was [93m1[0m.[93m30[0m to [93m2[0m.[93m07[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mnormalized[0m [93mdata[0m.

- [93mHierarchically[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mNitrogen[0m-[93mDoped[0m [93mCarbon[0m with [93mHigh[0m [93mConductivity[0m for [93mRapid[0m and [93mEfficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mReduction[0m.: [93mCarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mderived[0m from [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mexhibit[0m [93mmicroporous[0m [93mstructures[0m and [93mlow[0m [93mconductivity[0m, which [93msignificantly[0m [93mlimit[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m. [93mHerein[0m, an [93meffective[0m [93mstrategy[0m to [93mprepare[0m [93mdodecahedral[0m [93mhierarchical[0m [93mporous[0m [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcomposites[0m ([93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m) by [93musing[0m [93mZIF[0m-[93m8[0m [93mencapsulated[0m with [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m as [93mpyrolysis[0m [93mprecursors[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mreduction[0m is [93mdeveloped[0m. The [93mencapsulated[0m [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m [93mhelps[0m to [93mprecisely[0m [93mregulate[0m the [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m in [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m. This [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m not only [93mcreates[0m a [93mfavorable[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mmicroenvironment[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m the [93mmass[0m [93mtransfer[0m of [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93minteraction[0m with [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m, but [93malso[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93mconductivity[0m of [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m and [93mconsequently[0m [93maccelerating[0m the [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m of •[93mCO[0m [93m2[0m - [93mradicals[0m to [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mspeeding[0m up the [93mreduction[0m [93mprocess[0m of [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m). [93mAdditionally[0m, with the [93mcalcination[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mincreasing[0m, the [93mcontent[0m of [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mincreases[0m, and [93mN[0m [93mspecies[0m [93mprogressively[0m [93mtransforms[0m into [93mgraphitic[0m-[93mcenter[0m [93mN[0m ([93mN3[0m). [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mcalculations[0m [93mreveal[0m that the [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcenter[0m [93msubstantially[0m [93mdecreases[0m the [93mfree[0m [93menergy[0m [91mchange[0m of the [93mrate[0m-[93mdetermining[0m [93mstep[0m (from [93mCr[0m([93mIV[0m) to [93mCr[0m([93mIII[0m)) through the [93msynergistic[0m [93meffect[0m of [93mN3[0m. [93mGiven[0m these [93moutstanding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m, the [93moptimized[0m [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mcan[0m [93mcompletely[0m [93mreduce[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) ([93m333[0m.[93m3[0m [93mmg[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m ) in an [93moxalic[0m [93macid[0m [93msolution[0m within [93m2[0m [93mmin[0m, [93moutperforming[0m its [93mcounterparts[0m without a [93mhierarchical[0m [93mstructure[0m and those [93mcalcined[0m at [93msignificantly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mtemperatures[0m.

- [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m. By [93mvarying[0m the [93mspatial[0m [93mdistance[0m between a [93mpair[0m of [93mvacancies[0m, the in-[93mgap[0m [93mHOTPS[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mcharacteristic[0m [93menergy[0m [93msplitting[0m are [93mexperimentally[0m [93mobserved[0m, [93mindicating[0m the [93mtopology[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93mlonger[0m-[93mrange[0m [93minter[0m-[93mHOTPS[0m [93minteraction[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mfindings[0m that [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m [93mcan[0m [93mexhibit[0m the [93msame[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mproperties[0m as [93mouter[0m [93mcorners[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mbound[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mstates[0m and [93mquantized[0m [93mfractional[0m [93mcharges[0m, and [93mcan[0m be [93mcreated[0m [93mmore[0m [93mcontrollably[0m, [93mintroduce[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mavenue[0m in [93mHOTI[0m [93mresearch[0m and [93mset[0m the [93mstage[0m for [93mwider[0m [93mapplications[0m.
- [93mMechanoadaptive[0m [93mpolysaccharide[0m [93mconjugates[0m [93marchitect[0m [93mpro[0m-[93mhealing[0m [93mmicroenvironments[0m [93mvia[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mstress[0m [93mredistribution[0m in [93mskin[0m [93mdefects[0m.: The [93mtip[0m [93mstress[0m [93mconcentration[0m in [93mlinear[0m [93mwounds[0m, a [93mclinically[0m [93mprevalent[0m [93missue[0m [93myet[0m [93movershadowed[0m by [93mcircular[0m [93mdefect[0m [93mstudies[0m, and [93mchronic[0m [93mbiotemporal[0m [93mdiscordance[0m ([93mstatic[0m [93mbiomaterials[0m [93mversus[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mtissue[0m [93mremodeling[0m) [93mremain[0m [93mlargely[0m [93munderexplored[0m, [93mseverely[0m [93mimpeding[0m [93mwound[0m [93mhealing[0m. [93mHere[0m, an [93madhesive[0m [93mbioconjugate[0m [92mplatform[0m, [93mHADEX[0m, [93mcomposed[0m of [93mtwo[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mmicrometer[0m-[93msized[0m [93mpolysaccharide[0m-[93mderived[0m [93mgranules[0m, was [92mconstructed[0m for [93mprecise[0m [93mshaping[0m and [93mmanipulation[0m. [93mCombining[0m [93mfinite[0m [93melement[0m [92mmodeling[0m with a [93mdynamically[0m [93mcross[0m-[93mlinking[0m [93madhesive[0m [93mdriven[0m by [93mfluid[0m [93mconvection[0m, [93mHADEX[0m [93machieved[0m [93mboth[0m [93mconformal[0m [93mtissue[0m [93madhesion[0m and [93mmodulation[0m of the [93mstress[0m [93mdistribution[0m within [93mwet[0m, [93mlinear[0m [93mwounds[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mrestoring[0m [93mtissue[0m [93mpretension[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, [93mHADEX[0m [93mfacilitated[0m a [93mseamless[0m [93mload[0m [93mtransfer[0m to [93mregenerating[0m [93mtissue[0m through [93msynchronized[0m [93mHADEX[0m [93mdegradation[0m and [93mendogenous[0m [93mextracellular[0m [93mmatrix[0m [93mdeposition[0m. To [95mvalidate[0m the [93mefficacy[0m of [93mHADEX[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdemonstrated[0m [93msuccessful[0m [93msutureless[0m in [93mvivo[0m [93mclosure[0m and [93mhealing[0m of [93mlinear[0m [93mwounds[0m in [93mboth[0m the [93mnormal[0m/[93mdiabetic[0m [93mrat[0m and [93mporcine[0m [93mskin[0m [93mincision[0m [92mmodels[0m. The [93mintegration[0m of [93mcomputational[0m [92mdesign[0m with [93mbiomaterials[0m [93mestablished[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mpersonalized[0m, [93mmechanics[0m-[93minformed[0m [93mregenerative[0m [93mtherapies[0m.
- When [93mdefects[0m are not [93mdefects[0m
- [[93mNon[0m-[93mfibrocystic[0m [93mbronchiectasis[0m: [93mdescription[0m of a [93mseries[0m of [93m244[0m [93mpatients[0m].: [93mIntroduction[0m: [93mNon[0m-[93mcystic[0m [93mfibrosis[0m ([93mCF[0m) [93mbronchiectasis[0m is a [93mchronic[0m [93mlung[0m [93mcondition[0m [93mcaused[0m by [93mabnormal[0m [93mbronchial[0m, [93mresulting[0m from [93mvarious[0m [93metiologies[0m [93munrelated[0m to [93mcystic[0m [93mfibrosis[0m. The [93maim[0m of this [93mstudy[0m is to [93mdescribe[0m a [93mseries[0m of [93mpatients[0m with [93mnon[0m-[93mCF[0m [93mbronchiectasis[0m. [93mMaterials[0m and [93mmethods[0m: A [93mretrospective[0m [93mstudy[0m was [93mconducted[0m on [93madult[0m [93mpatients[0m (= [93m18[0m [93myears[0m) with [93mnon[0m-[93mCF[0m [93mbronchiectasis[0m [93mconfirmed[0m by [93mhigh[0m [93mresolution[0m [93mcomputed[0m [93mtomography[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m244[0m [93mpatients[0m were [93mincluded[0m in the [93mstudy[0m. The [93mpopulation[0m was [93mpredominantly[0m [93mfemale[0m ([93m60[0m%), and the [93mmean[0m [93mage[0m was [93m64[0m [93myears[0m. The [93mmost[0m [93mfrequent[0m [93mcauses[0m of [93mnon[0m-[93mCF[0m [93mbronchiectasis[0m were [93mtuberculosis[0m ([93m28[0m%) and [93mpost[0m [93minfectious[0m [93metiologies[0m ([93m21[0m%). [93mDyspnea[0m was the [93mprimary[0m [93msymptom[0m [93mreported[0m in [93m56[0m% of [93mcases[0m. [93mTomographic[0m [93mabnormalities[0m [93maffecting[0m [93mthree[0m or [93mmore[0m [93mlobules[0m were [93mobserved[0m in [93m35[0m% of [93mpatients[0m, while [93mbi[0m-[93mlobar[0m [93mabnormalities[0m were [93mnoted[0m in [93m33[0m%. The [93mmost[0m [93mcommon[0m [93mspirometric[0m [93mpattern[0m was the [93mobstruction[0m ([93m37[0m%). [93mMore[0m than [93mone[0m [93mhalf[0m of the [93mpatients[0m [93mhad[0m a [93mreduction[0m in the [93mdiffusing[0m [93mcapacity[0m for [93mcarbon[0m [93mmonoxide[0m ([93mDLCO[0m). [93mMicrobiological[0m [93misolates[0m were [93midentified[0m in [93m33[0m [93mpatients[0m ([93m13[0m.[93m5[0m%). The [93mmost[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93misolated[0m [93mspecies[0m was [93mPseudomonas[0m [93maeruginosa[0m, in [93m17[0m of those [93m33[0m ([93m51[0m.[93m5[0m%). [93mInhaled[0m [93mtherapies[0m were [93mused[0m in [93m53[0m% of [93mpatients[0m, and [93minhaled[0m [93msteroids[0m in [93m52[0m% of [93mpatients[0m. [93mAccording[0m to the [93mFACED[0m [93mscore[0m, [93m75[0m% of [93mpatients[0m were [93mclassified[0m as [93mmild[0m [93mdisease[0m. [93mDiscussion[0m: In [93mour[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mtuberculosis[0m was the [93mmost[0m [93mcommon[0m [93mcause[0m of [93mnon[0m-[93mCF[0m [93mbronchiectasis[0m, which [93mrepresents[0m a [93mdistinctive[0m [93mcharacteristic[0m of [93mour[0m [93mpopulation[0m when [93mcompared[0m to [93mother[0m [93mmajor[0m [93mreported[0m [93mseries[0m.

- [93mUltrasonic[0m [93mcavitation[0m [93mshock[0m [93mwave[0m [93mexfoliation[0m [93mdynamics[0m of [93m2D[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mrevealed[0m in [93msitu[0m by [93mMHz[0m [93mXFEL[0m [93mimaging[0m and [93mmultiphysics[0m [92mmodeling[0m.: [93mUsing[0m [93mmegahertz[0m [93mx[0m-[93mray[0m [93mfree[0m [93melectron[0m [93mlaser[0m [93mimaging[0m with [93mx[0m-[93mray[0m [93mpulses[0m of ~[93m25[0m [93mfemtoseconds[0m and a [93mmachine[0m-[93mlearning[0m [93mstrategy[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mhave[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mcomprehensive[0m in [93msitu[0m [93mimaging[0m [93mstudies[0m on the [93mdynamics[0m of [93mcavitation[0m [93mbubble[0m [93mclouds[0m in [93multrasound[0m [93mfields[0m at the [93mSPB[0m/[93mSFX[0m [93mbeamline[0m of the [93mEuropean[0m [93mXFEL[0m. The [93mresearch[0m [93munambiguously[0m [93mrevealed[0m the [93mquasi[0m-[93msimultaneous[0m [93mimplosion[0m of [93mmultiple[0m [93mbubbles[0m and [93msimultaneous[0m [93mcollapse[0m of [93mbubble[0m [93mcloud[0m in [93mnanosecond[0m [93mscale[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mdynamic[0m [93mimpacts[0m onto [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mmaterials[0m for [93mlayer[0m [93mexfoliation[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mhave[0m [93malso[0m [93mperformed[0m [93mmultiphysics[0m [92mmodeling[0m to [93msimulate[0m the [93mshock[0m [93mwave[0m [93memission[0m, [93mpropagation[0m, [93mimpact[0m, and [93mstresses[0m [93mproduced[0m. [93mWe[0m [93melucidated[0m the [93mcritical[0m [93mconditions[0m for [93mproducing[0m [93minstant[0m or [93mfatigue[0m [93mexfoliation[0m and the [93meffects[0m of [93mbonding[0m [93mstrengths[0m and [93mstructural[0m [93mdefects[0m on the [93mexfoliation[0m [93mrate[0m.
